about_the_game:
You’re a member of the Liminal Layer Society: an organization of spellcasters who protect the world from entities that leak from the Void. You set out to explore the “Liminal Layer,” which is the bridge between reality and the Void. YOU WILL DIE. A LOT. Death is progress. Death brings you closer to the Void Gods: your primary targets.

Play as one of four selectable characters with their own playstyles and spells, and unlock multiple endings based on who you choose and their companion. It will get dark, chaotic, and confusing.

THIS IS NOT A GAME FOR THE EPILEPTIC. THERE ARE A LOT OF FLASHING LIGHTS, SCREEN EFFECTS, AND POST EFFECTS. WE ARE STILL WORKING ON A SAFE MODE

Collect Sigils

You will need “Sigils” to fight the Void Gods and enemies. They are the currency for your spells and portals to enter the next layer safely. Survival in each layer is determined by your “Death Counter” and your ability to prevent liminal entities from touching you. Dying will automatically send you to the next random layer at the cost of the opportunity to collect more Sigils.

Snatch Souls

Liminal Entities are dangerous and can kill you once they touch you. However, they contain souls that can be used to cast more spells. Snatch them and expand your arsenal of spells. Additionally, soul snatches add more time to your death counter so you can explore and find more sigils.

Cast Spells

To avoid entities from killing you in the layer, you can either soul snatch them or destroy them. Spells are your primary tools of combat, with different types and advantages depending on enemy types. Additionally, more powerful spells cost more sigils.

Kill the Void Gods

Getting to Layer 444 can happen within the spectrum of two ways: do absolutely nothing, keep dying, and enter layer 444 with no sigils to get decimated by the Void Gods OR fight for your life and stockpile sigils so you will have enough ammo to spam spells onto the Void Gods. They have very high health, so be ready for a long fight.

Features:

  • Rogue-inspired minimalist gameplay focusing on strategy and resource management

  • Death is not the end. You will always have a chance to redeem yourself in the next layer

  • Score system based on kills, successful soul snatches, and sigil collection

  • Four unique characters with their own stories and playstyles

  • Multiple Endings: 16 Different Endings Depending on Player and Companion Choices

  • 32 Unique Spells with varying types and effects

  • 12 Skills with varying game-changing effects, such as timescale, enemy behavior, visibility, collectible items, and more

  • Over 20 Different Liminal Entities With varying types, stats, and spells

Guitar-heavy ambient soundscapes and extreme metal soundtrack

REAL TALK

Constant Updates and such until 2025. An active discord, and a super cool dev. Give them money! New scream fest character designs and expanded lore as the game updates. This is a very alive ephemeral gaming experience. 

UPDATE V1.078 Thus Far:

  • Lock-ON System

  • Refined Codex

  • Enhanced VFX

  • Screamfest Skins (Spooky Mode)

  • DEATH LOTTERY

  • OST VOL 1 Release

  • MAP

  • DOGS DOGS DOGS

  • Cats

  • New Game over cinematics :)

  • VOIDLAYER BEASTS

  • MOOD (as in enhanced audio feedback fx based on entities nearby)

  • More toggles for customizable gameplay

  • A more enhanced CHILL MODE where enemies do not approach you.

  • A whole lotta optimization fixes for smoother and faster gameplay

content_descriptors.notes: Dialogue within the game contain coarse language. Story and dialogue mention sensitive topics such as drug addiction, suicide, sexual acts, and violence. Blood and Gore is very little.

legal_notice: Seizure Warning: This game has many flashing lights.
name: Liminal Void

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or RX 460
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Octo-Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or RX 480
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: This is a horror dungeon crawler where you snatch souls, cast spells, and die repeatedly. Select from 4 colorful characters and occasionally listen to them yap about their problems. It's very "mood."
